Update User Profile

Source: R/updateProfile.R
update_user.Rd

Updates a user's profile information in Firebase Authentication. Commonly used in Shiny apps to manage user profile data.

Usage

update_user(idToken, displayName = NULL, photoUrl = NULL)

Arguments

idToken

Character string. The Firebase ID token of the authenticated user.

displayName

Optional character string. The user's new display name.

photoUrl

Optional character string. URL of the user's new profile photo.

Value

A list containing the updated profile information, including:

  • displayName: The user's updated display name.

  • photoUrl: The user's updated profile photo URL.

  • email: The user's email address.

  • localId: The unique identifier for the user.

Common Error Codes

  • INVALID_ID_TOKEN: The provided ID token is invalid.

  • USER_DISABLED: The user account has been disabled.

  • TOKEN_EXPIRED: The provided ID token has expired.

See also

get_user for retrieving user profile information

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# In a Shiny app
auth_result <- signInWithPassword("user@example.com", "password")

# Update the user's profile
updated_profile <- update_user(
  idToken = auth_result$idToken,
  displayName = "New Name",
  photoUrl = "https://example.com/photo.jpg"
)
} # }
